      • getChartRendererName

        String getChartRendererName()
        Gets the name that represent the ChartRenderer
        Returns:
        name of the ChartRenderer

      • getChartRenderer

        Object getChartRenderer()
        Useful to swing part. The idea is: If someone wants to implement his own ChartService with his own renderers using an underlaying library, the main object can be reached by this method. In our case, the object will be a JFreeChart renderer, but if not, the Swing library can make its own cast.
        Returns:
        the inner object renderer that the library uses to draw.
